text:
Mrs. Lilian D. Plante
Office of Reports
Ford Foundation
477 Madison Avenue
New York 22, New York
Dear Mrs. Plante:
I am enclosing herewith a further list of 34 names to be included in your
mailings of the report on educational television.
May I thank you very much in advance for the beautiful copies we received
in our office today from the Ford Foundation.
Sincerely,
Secretary to
Administrative Vice President
